Justin Timberlake took to Instagram on Monday, July 31, to praise his wife, Jessica Biel, for her performance on her new TV series, The Sinner. “ OK, I know I ’ m not exactly fair and maybe biased here, but my wife ’ s new show – @ thesinnerusa – is amazing, ” the 10 - time Grammy winner, 36, captioned a trailer for the eight - episode USA Network crime drama. “ It ’ s like nothing I ’ ve seen her in before, and she ’ s incredible in the role. You should check it out when it premieres Wednesday on USA. – JT. ” The actress, 35, plays Cora, a young mother living in upstate New York who commits a brutal act of violence against a stranger
